modules.description: Handles cryptographic operations including AES encryption and decryption with CBC mode, HMAC generation, and key derivation using PBKDF2. Works with byte sequences, cryptographic keys, and initialization vectors. Used to secure data transmission in network protocols and protect sensitive user information in storage.
Encrypts strings using Unix-style password hashing algorithms. Accepts a password and a salt, returning the hashed result. Supports both standard and MD5-based hashing for secure credential storage.
